description: one coin on the top of the card and one on the bottom are surrounded by an S-shaped design with the text CLAUDE BURDEL CARTIER ET GRAVEUR 1751; from a deck of 78 hand-colored triumph playing cards
inscription: Designer and date printed on the lemniscate (ribbon) design: CLAUDE.BURDEL.CARTIER.ET.GRAVEUR.1751
provenance:
'Lady Charlotte Elizabeth Schrieber, 1812-1895, London [1]. Carl A. Weyerhaeuser, Minneapolis (by 1937); given to MIA, 1996.

1. Note with deck states: "Swiss Tarot. / Complete 78 Cards / from Schreiber Collection"
title: Two of Coins
